title: Computer Hardware Troubleshooting
description: Master the skills needed to identify, diagnose, and fix common computer hardware problems. Learn practical techniques for repairing desktops, laptops, and peripheral devices.

videos.title: የኮምፒዩተር ሃርድዌር ችግኝ መፍትሄ - ክፍል 1 (Computer Hardware Troubleshooting Part 1)
የላፕቶፕ ሃርድዌር ጥገና (Laptop Hardware Repair Basics)
የኮምፒዩተር ፓርትስ ምርመራ እና ጥገና (Diagnosing and Fixing Computer Parts)
